chinese: m.四分之一；一个季度；一刻钟
english: quarter

chinese: 我可以吃这块比萨的四分之一。
english: I can eat a quarter of this pizza

chinese: v.释放；免除（责任、债务等）；发行加解除；释放；发表
english: release

chinese: 这名囚犯服完刑后被释放了。
english: The prisoner was released after completing his sentence

chinese: Y值得，博得；命令；指挥，统率 几、指令
english: command

chinese: 这个男人命令他的狗朝那边跑。
english: The man commanded his dog to run over there

chinese: adj，危急的；爱挑剔的
english: critical

chinese: 这位伤者情况危急，医生们赶紧把他送到急诊
english: The injured man is in a critical condition, so doctors rush him to the emergency room

chinese: 凡.烈士 区迫害，折磨
english: martyr

chinese: 他因公殉职，被授予烈士称号。
english: He died in the line of duty and was dubbed a martyr

chinese: n.繁菜，兴旺，发达
english: prosperity

chinese: 这忙碌的夜景显示着这座城市的繁荣。
english: The prosperity of the city is evident from this busy nighttime scene

chinese: 因干涉；介入；调停
english: intervene

chinese: 当老师介入时，他们才停止打架。
english: They only stopped fighting when the teacher intervened

chinese: m 引人注目的中心舞台照明，聚光灯，舞台上照明部分
english: limelight

chinese: 她享受在聚光灯下众所瞩目的感觉。
english: She enjoys the feeling of being in the limelight

chinese: n 外星人adi！ 外国的
english: alien

chinese: 你有没有根过外星人可能是我们的朋友？
english: Do you ever think that aliens could be our friends?

chinese: 四胶囊；航天舱，密封舱
english: capsule

chinese: 该药可以以胶囊的形式服用。
english: The medicine can be taken in capsule form

chinese: adj，温暖舒适的，安逸的 V.取悦
english: cozy

chinese: 小宝宝看起来在柔软的毯子上睡得很舒服。
english: The baby looked very cozy sleeping on the soft blanket

chinese: 几天国；天堂；极乐世界
english: paradise

chinese: 这一地区是鸟类观察者的乐园。
english: The area is a birdwatcher's paradise

chinese: ut.操纵，影响；正骨
english: manipulate

chinese: 舞台上的这个男人熟练地用线操纵木偶。
english: The man on the stage expertly manipulates the puppets using strings

chinese: ed），命令的，强制性的
english: mandatory

chinese: 统一发型是军训的强制性要求。
english: Uniform hairstyle is a mandatory requirement for military training

chinese: cd）发光的；鲜艳的；明亮的；夜光的
english: luminous

chinese: 装着萤火虫的罐子在晚上会发出点点亮光。
english: This jar of fireflies are luminous and glow at night

chinese: aa）自满的，得意的
english: complacent

chinese: 这个自以为是的司机太自信了，并没意识到在结冰的路上驾驶的危险。
english: The complacent driver is too confident and hasn't noticed the danger on the icy road
